important.title: &productname; &productnumber; repository size
important.para:
The &productname; &productnumber; repositories will grow over time because older package versions are not removed. Based on the current
As of 02 July, 2025 size of the repositories, to meet the 1.5 times size recommendation you will need approximately 440 GB of disk space for the default repositories.
If you need the optional Source and Debug repositories, you will need an additional 1060 GB available.
